mapper.select:
select o.ORG_ID as orgId, o.ORG_NAME as orgName, o.PARENT_ORG_ID as parentOrgId, o.SHORT_NAME as shortName, o.ORG_TYPE as orgType, o.ORG_LEVEL as orgLevel, o.ORG_LEVEL_CODE as orgLevelCode, o.REMARK as remark, o.IS_LEAF as isLeaf, o.ORG_NAME as parentOrgName
from T_SYS_ORG o left join T_SYS_ORG po on o.PARENT_ORG_ID = po.ORG_ID where 1=1
AND o.PARENT_ORG_ID = #{entity.parentOrgId}
{{authFilterSql}} order by o.ORG_LEVEL_CODE
